sentences.en: A: Switching over to organically grown cotton was a really big deal.
sentences.cn: 答: 改用有机的棉花花了我们相当大的心力.

sentences.en: All ingredients are organically grown and wild crafted.
sentences.cn: 所有成分是有机生成并且手工制造.

sentences.en: Are organically grown foods the best food choices?
sentences.cn: 绿色食品是最佳食物 吗 ?

sentences.en: Are we talking about organically - based cold fusion?
sentences.cn: 我们是在讨论基于有机结构的冷聚变 吗 ?

sentences.en: Consumers are prepared to pay a premium for organically grown vegetables.
sentences.cn: 消费者已经做好准备为购买有机蔬菜多花钱.

sentences.en: It is always best to choose organically grown foods if possible.
sentences.cn: 如果可能，最好还是挑选有机食品。

sentences.en: Many farms are jumping on the bandwagon and advertising organically grown food.
sentences.cn: 很多农场正赶潮流宣传有机食品。

sentences.en: Some shops are bowing to consumer pressure and stocking organically grown vegetables.
sentences.cn: 一些商店迫于顾客的压力，开始供应有机蔬菜。

sentences.en: The actual bridge evaluation criterion are combined with fuzzy evaluation organically.
sentences.cn: 把模糊评估与现行的桥梁评估规范有机的结合起来.

sentences.en: The aliens grow their technology organically.
sentences.cn: 这些外星人发展有机科技.

sentences.en: The master Sekotan shipbuilders grew their vessels organically.
sentences.cn: 赛寇特造船高手将这种船从地里种出来.
这些番茄是用有机肥料栽培的.

sentences.en: This article unifies the geometry simulation and the physical simulation organically together.
sentences.cn: 本文将几何仿真和物理仿真有机地结合在一起.
这种食物是有机生成的.

sentences.en: Two of the reports included foods that were not organically grown.
sentences.cn: 报告中有两篇是关于非绿色生长的食品.

words.tran_cn: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有组织的；组织起来的（等于organized）
[生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音
有机体说；唯器官变化论
组织（等于organize）；有机化；给予生机
组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
